[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Frequently Asked Questions” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Tickets” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_tta_accordion section_title_tag=”h6″ style=”flat” gap=”5″ c_position=”right” active_section=”0″ no_fill=”true” collapsible_all=”true” el_class=”gg_accordion”][vc_tta_section title=”How do I get my free ticket” tab_id=”1684930022602-1a42968d-18f2″][vc_column_text]If you have a BOGOF code, add the extra ticket at the time of purchase and you would not be charged for it. This means you would be charged the same price for 1 and 2 tickets. No extra tickets are added after your purchase.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the age classifications of the tickets” tab_id=”1684930251800-e2665faf-ad7f”][vc_column_text]Infants (0-2 years) enter for free
Children ( 3-11 years)
Adults ( 12+)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I purchase a ticket at the water park?” tab_id=”1682598504888-ce7dd94b-a5fa1682602797762″][vc_column_text]No. All ticket puchases must be done on the water park website.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How much are tickets?” tab_id=”1682598504896-289e14d0-48ec1682602797762″][vc_column_text]There are 3 ticket categories; Standard, Fast-track and Premium. Please see tickets for prices and what each ticket type includes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is included in my ticket?” tab_id=”1682599082954-84fc26f7-2d391682602797762″][vc_column_text]Please see tickets for prices and what each ticket type includes.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How much is parking” tab_id=”1682599141597-6ef0a1cc-a0821682602797762″][vc_column_text]Onsite parking is free. The Giwa Gardens Water Park can accommodate 800 cars and visitors will be charged nothing. The park will be secured with CCTVs and security personnels. However, please ensure that your car is properly locked and that you remove all valuables, as the park will not be held accountable for any theft.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do I need to purchase a ticket even if I will not be using the park?” tab_id=”1682599178733-8f51e39a-859b1682602797762″][vc_column_text]Everyone who enters the park must purchase a ticket.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I reenter the Water park if I leave?” tab_id=”1682599231288-198887cb-2fb61682602797762″][vc_column_text]Yes you can, as long as it is same day and you are wearing your ticket wristband[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Once I am in the park, how long can I stay?” tab_id=”1682599265232-7fb5478f-e2de1682602797762″][vc_column_text]For day admissions, you are welcome to stay as long as you wish on the day of your admission. Night parties are booked specially and a day ticket does not admit you for a night’s stay.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How to do I book my tickets?” tab_id=”1684528116107-1eca4d6a-344d”][vc_column_text]

Please go to www.giwagardens.com and on the home page, use the find ticket search to select a date, number of tickets and add your coupon if you have one.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How do I use my Coupon?” tab_id=”1684529671637-be5a5017-cdad”][vc_column_text]

For example, if you are using the BUY ONE GET ONE FREE (BOGOFF) coupon and it has not expired, it will be applied in your basket page. If you have not added it, you may do so in the coupon text field and click ‘apply’. Upon applying, you will have an additional ticket added and your discount displayed as in image below:

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What type of tickets can I get?” tab_id=”1684530191340-8f1d5ca8-0b12″][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How do I use my BOGOFF (Buy One Get One Free) Coupon code?” tab_id=”1684530697087-f39892b6-1c7c”][vc_column_text]The current coupon code is: GIWA241. If you are buying just one ticket, the code will not apply as you can see in the image below. You have to select two tickets to get another one free.

For example in the image below, I have selected 2 tickets and the second one has been added totally free.

If you are buying 3 tickets, you get one free and pay for 2. If you are buying 4 tickets you get two free and pay for two. If you are buying 5 tickets, you get 2 free and pay for 3. The discount only applies in two’s .

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”When do I get Food & Accessories?” tab_id=”1684531423804-59ed73eb-76fd”][vc_column_text]We operate a cashless environment at Giwa Gardens water park and as a result, all purchases must be done online, however you do not need to buy these until a few days to your ticket dates or on the day. As a result you can select “I’ll do this later”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Your Booking Summary Page” tab_id=”1684531566174-c83bd86e-aa7d”][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Placing Your Order” tab_id=”1684531723420-7e5968cd-f522″][vc_column_text]You can select to pay via Paystack or Squad. Both payment options are available for you.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Paying via Paystack” tab_id=”1684531931173-5983c6dc-4a05″][vc_column_text]You have the option to pay via card, bank, transfer, in USSD or Visa QR. If card option fails we recommend bank transfer as it tends to work 99.9% of the time. Please follow the instructions.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How do I get my tickets upon successful payment?” tab_id=”1684532488374-6a79fdd2-a18a”][vc_column_text]Your tickets will always be in your account page however once payment is successful you are notified of your booking and given the option to view your tickets. Please note that tickets are not assigned until you have assigned them yourself. You are free to do this whenever you want before the day of your dated ticket.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”30″][vc_custom_heading text=”Ride Restrictions” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_tta_accordion section_title_tag=”h6″ style=”flat” gap=”5″ c_position=”right” active_section=”0″ no_fill=”true” collapsible_all=”true” el_class=”gg_accordion”][vc_tta_section title=”What are the weight restrictions” tab_id=”1684932262680-71124749-8d49″][vc_column_text]

Each of the rides has a specific weight restriction generally from 40kg-90kg. See our rule book for a comprehensive list of the individual limits. 
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the height restrictions” tab_id=”1684932191856-4303c604-249d”][vc_column_text]Each ride has its individual height restriction which ranges from 1.4m-2m. Please see our safety guidelines for a list of all height limitations[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the age restrictions” tab_id=”1684932192725-446fcca8-f63f”][vc_column_text]The rides at the water park are not recommended for infants, toddlers and the elderly; from age 55 upwards. Please see our rule book for a comprehensive list of the limitations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the health restrictions” tab_id=”1684932193680-8a2b8046-0306″][vc_column_text]The rides are not recommended for pregnant women, individuals with heart diseases, high blood pressure or any related conditions. Please see our health and safety guidelines for a comprehensive list of restrictions. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][vc_empty_space height=”30″][vc_custom_heading text=”Rules” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_tta_accordion section_title_tag=”h6″ style=”flat” gap=”5″ c_position=”right” active_section=”0″ no_fill=”true” collapsible_all=”true” el_class=”gg_accordion”][vc_tta_section title=”What are the General Park Rule” tab_id=”1684932316599-85988e0d-38f8″][vc_column_text]
See our rule book for a comprehensive list of The Giwa Gardens Water Park rules. Some of them include:
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the age requirements for the Water park” tab_id=”1684932317218-6161581f-ab2e”][vc_column_text]See our safety guidelines for a list of all rides and experiences as well as their respective age requirements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I bring my pet to the Giwa Gardens Water Park?” tab_id=”1684932318028-16340ed6-ee90″][vc_column_text]
No pets are allowed at the Water Park
For a list of  don’ts, please see our waterpark rules and guidelines
[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Can I bring food into the waterpark” tab_id=”1684932318834-db024672-3664″][vc_column_text]No, food items are not allowed to be brought into the park [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”30″][vc_custom_heading text=”Accessories” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_tta_accordion section_title_tag=”h6″ style=”flat” gap=”5″ c_position=”right” active_section=”0″ no_fill=”true” collapsible_all=”true” el_class=”gg_accordion”][vc_tta_section title=”If I forget something can I purchase it at the park?” tab_id=”1682599611260-0ffc2910-07901682602797934″][vc_column_text]Yes. Swim suits, phone protectors, swimming caps, goggles, beach slippers can be purchased at the water park. See accessories for a comprehensive list  and their prices.

Guests may not bring any recreating floating devices to the park as floating tubes (and towels ) will be freely provided but must be returned after use. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
